channel.title: DLCs on Boring Man - OTSC Wiki
channel.description: Recent content in DLCs on Boring Man - OTSC Wiki

item.title: Premium!
item.description: Introduction The Premium DLC is a DLC that gives access to cool aesthetic features! You can buy it here for 4,99$. Menu In the menu, you can now click on “Premium Options”. Clicking on it will open a bunch options that are listed afterwards. Options in menu ↕ Features Hats You can choose a hat from 56 hats!

item.title: Skins
item.description: Introduction All DLCs described on this page give access to unique skins. Burning skins These weapon skins are hot hot hot! If you like suffering from 3rd degree burns while slaughtering your enemies, than these weapon skins are right up your alley! You can buy it here for 1,59$. Screenshots ↕ Platinum skins Do you think your weapons aren’t shiny enough?

item.title: TAC-CORP VIP Access
item.description: Introduction There is a DLC that can be bought for the game TUNNEL DIVERS. It is called TAC-CORP VIP Access and gives access to features for that game. You can buy it for 3.99$. Owning this DLC also unlock the Phantom Weapon skins and a new hat in Boring Man - OTSC. Features Phantom skins Hat
